nodes.bodyText: I think once you start getting opaque selectors like this, it's worth adding a comment to explicitly state your target.
I'm guessing you want this to match the above 250px. So could be worth dropping it in a variable.

Could make sense to pull this 3px out into a variable, and then you can also re-use in those other places which has this. One place was the buttons, however looking above I now see that's at 4px. Shouldn't these match? If so, should it be 4 or 3? (I guess that highlights the use of putting it in a variable.)
